scripts.build: mkdir -p public/js/{core,components,services,utils,config} && cp src/core/graph.js public/js/core/ && cp src/core/workspace-graph.js public/js/core/ && cp src/core/graph-visualizer.js public/js/core/ && cp src/core/MetricsCalculator.js public/js/core/ && cp src/components/MetricsDisplay.js public/js/components/ && cp src/services/hexService.js public/js/services/ && cp src/utils/utils.js public/js/utils/ && cp src/config/config.js public/js/config/ && cp src/services/aiService.js public/js/services/
